name: Picante! Wow! Hot! [Muy Prototype Version]
description:

🌶️Picante! Wow! Hot! is a 3D Action Roguelite prototype about evil peppers started for Secret Santa Jam 2021.

🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑

🌶️DISCLAIMER: It's still a barebone project. Check lacking features below. Feel free to test it out and tell me what you think, if I should drop the project altogether and give me suggestions.

🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑🌶️🫑

🌶️Controls: Ability 1 Left Mouse Button Ability 2 Q Ability 3 E Item Slotsalpha 1-4 Movement WASD Run Shift Jump Space Interact F Aim Mode Right Mouse Button Show cursor Middle Mouse Button Toggle Upgrades Menu U Toggle Inventory I Pause Menu Esc 🌶️Features:
  1. cartoon style easy on the eyes inspired by peppers, hot sauce, and how every time an American film shows Mexico it's all so yellow;
  2. random generated maze map with eight random buffs to help on your run;
  3. three ranged weapons;
  4. one boss fight;
  5. five player abilities;
  6. three enemies.
🌶️Planned features:
  1. eight more random buffs;
  2. three melee weapons;
  3. one more boss fight;
  4. at least five more abilities;
  5. two more enemies;
  6. some new models;
  7. intro cutscene;
  8. more NPCs;
  9. items, crafting;
  10. balancing;
  11. music;
  12. a secret minigame 😉.
